member.name: P:NetBackgammon.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NetBackgammon.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:NetBackgammon.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: T:NetBackgammon.CallBackDelegate
member.summary: Delegate for the call back function
member.remarks: Declare method with signature 'Sub [AnyMethodName](status as String)'

member.name: M:NetBackgammon.CallBackThread.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.Control@,NetBackgammon.ThreadFunctionDelegate@,NetBackgammon.CallBackDelegate@)
member.param: The Form/Control that implements the call back function
The pointer to the function that implements the thread logic(use AddressOf() to assign)
The pointer to the call back function(use AddressOf() to assign)
member.remarks: Call 'Start' to start thread and use UpdateUI to send status messages to UI

member.name: M:NetBackgammon.CallBackThread.UpdateUI(System.Object)
member.summary: Sends the status to the Form/Control that implements the Call back method.

member.name: T:NetBackgammon.CallBackThread
member.summary: Class to process any function in a thread
member.remarks: This would be typically a function that connects to a Remote and updates a progress back to Form or a function that monitors the disk for any changes in a database or a hardware interupt monitoring ...
